arts.ttl: FC Midtjylland v Celtic – Martin O’Neill’s European return
arts.sum: It’s back Europa League action for Celtic on tonight with a trip to Denmark to face surprise group leaders FC Midtjylland at the MCH Arena in the early 5.45pm kickoff… Celtic opened the campaign with a 1-1 draw in Belgrade away to Crvena zvezda, more commonly known to older readers as Red Star Belgrade. arts.ttl: Callum Osmand call rocks the Celtic boat as Tierney and Forrest force Martin O'Neill's hand for Midtjylland
arts.sum: Martin O'Neill could turn to two sure things and one new boy for tonight's Europa League clash in Denmark

arts.ttl: Midtjylland’s Mbabu insults Celtic with Arne Engels remark
arts.sum: FC Midtjylland’s Kevin Mbabu reckons Celtic’s Arne Engels has the potential to join a ‘big team’ within the next few years… Mbabu previously played with the Hoops midfielder at FC Augsburg in the German Bundesliga, and Engels has recently impressed after being brought back into the Celtic lineup by interim boss Martin O’Neill. However, Mbabu Read More

arts.ttl: Celtic XI vs FC Midtjylland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Celtic are gearing up for a UEFA Europa League encounter at the MCH Arena this Thursday against FC Midtjylland. The Danish team has demonstrated excellent form throughout this season, while Celtic approach the match with renewed confidence under the interim management team of Martin O’Neill and Shaun Maloney. Celtic have recently shown signs of improvement […] The post Celtic XI vs FC Midtjylland – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: FC Midtjylland vs Celtic – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: FC Midtjylland and Celtic are set to clash in the UEFA Europa League at the MCH Arena on Thursday. The Danish side has been in outstanding form this season, while Celtic arrive with renewed optimism under the interim management of Martin O’Neill and Shaun Maloney. FC Midtjylland vs Celtic – Match preview and team news […] The post FC Midtjylland vs Celtic – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

MARTIN O’NEILL will roll back the years as he leads his players into his first European tie as Celtic manager in 20 years. The Irishman, in charge in an interim basis after the shock departure of Brendan Rodgers at the start of last week, will prepare his troops for a Europa League encounter against FC [...]

arts.ttl: “They took in a legend” – Midtjylland boss on Martin O’Neill’s Celtic return
arts.sum: Mike Tullberg, head coach at FC Midtjylland, spoke to the media today ahead of tomorrow evening’s Europa League match at their 12k capacity MCH Arena against Celtic… Tullberg, who was as a player once on the books at Hearts, has his team in a winning groove, as the three wins from three Europa League games Read More

arts.ttl: Match officials named for Celtic’s games against FC Midtjylland and Kilmarnock
arts.sum: Next up for Celtic under Martin O’Neill and Shaun Maloney is a rather intriguing encounter in central Jutland against Danish high-flyers FC Midtjylland in Thursday evening’s early kick-off (5.45pm CPT) match in the Europa League… There will be a media conference from Martin O’Neill and possibly Shaun Maloney at the MCH Arena this evening and Read More
